title: Get all IMAGE Nodes
user_story:
As an API consumer\
I want to be able to request all IMAGEs\
So I can process them without having to load each of them individually
description:
# **Request**

* method: `GET`
* URL path: `/images`

# **Response**

**Happy path**

* positive HTTP status code (200)
* a JSON array of all image nodes, each having the following properties:
  * `id``: integer`
  * `external_id``: string`
  * `image_provider``: string`
  * `name``: string`
  * `description``: string/null`
  * `creator``: string`
  * `license``: string`
  * `tags``: string/null`
  * `source``: string`
  * `image_url_original``: string`
  * `image_url_xxl``: string/null`
  * `image_url_xl``: string/null`
  * `image_url_l``: string/null`
  * `image_url_m``: string/null`
  * `image_url_s``: string/null`
  * `image_url_xs``: string/null`
  * `created_at``: string`
  * `updated_at``: string`

**Unhappy path**

* n.a. → when there are no images an empty array is returned → same status code (200)

# **Acceptance Criteria**

**Behavior (Business logic)**

* all existing nodes of that node type are returned as a list → 200
* an empty list is returned when there exist no nodes of that node type in the database → 200

# **Quality Gates**

* Unit+Integration tests (Jest) are extended (100% coverage combined)
* Behavior tests (Cucumber) are added (100% coverage)
* OpenAPI spec is extended
  * schema is still valid
* Bruno collection is extended
* Performance tests are extended
  * tests are still green

# **NOT in scope for this iteration**

* relationships with other nodes (e.g. car models or company)
* proper JSON structure according to the JSON:API
* sorting, filtering, pagination
